name: Steel✨Shiny✨1/2 #21
bio: Meeeeow, I'm Steel✨Shiny✨1/2 #21! I love to hit the high notes on the background vocals. Do you like my outfit? Latex and leather were the last fashion statement that mattered. Too bad I stopped wearing pants cause they were too tight. Welcome to Katz, the gift that keeps on rocking.
